task_list.name: Cellpose SAM Segmentation
task_list.docs_info:
### Purpose
- Description and documentation of the Task functionality
- Bullet points that cover main features of the tasks.
- Can use **full** *markdown* formatting (including embedding images).

### Outputs
- Optional section on what kind of outputs the task generates. For the thresholding_task: Generates a new label image named `label_name`.

### Limitations
- List known limitations of the task (e.g. only works for certain data types).

normalization.title: Normalization
normalization.description: Normalization model to use. Options are DefaultNorm (use Cellpose default normalization), NoNorm (disable normalization), or CustomNorm (full control over normalization parameters). Defaults to DefaultNorm().

batch_size.title: Batch Size
batch_size.description: number of 256x256 patches to run simultaneously on the GPU (can make smaller or bigger depending on GPU memory usage). Defaults to 8.

resample.title: Resample
resample.description: run dynamics at original image size (will be slower but create more accurate boundaries). Defaults to True.

invert.title: Invert
invert.description: invert image pixel intensity before running network. Defaults to False.

diameter.title: Diameter
diameter.description: diameters are used to rescale the image to 30 pix cell diameter.

flow_threshold.title: Flow Threshold
flow_threshold.description: flow error threshold (all cells with errors below threshold are kept) (not used for 3D). Defaults to 0.4.

cellprob_threshold.title: Cellprob Threshold
cellprob_threshold.description: all pixels with value above threshold kept for masks, decrease to find more and larger masks. Defaults to 0.0.

flow3D_smooth.title: Flow3D Smooth
flow3D_smooth.description: if do_3D and flow3D_smooth>0, smooth flows with gaussian filter of this stddev. Defaults to 0.

anisotropy.title: Anisotropy
anisotropy.description: for 3D segmentation, optional rescaling factor (e.g. set to 2.0 if Z is sampled half as dense as X or Y). Defaults to None.

stitch_threshold.title: Stitch Threshold
stitch_threshold.description: if stitch_threshold>0.0 and not do_3D, masks are stitched in 3D to return volume segmentation. Defaults to 0.0.

min_size.title: Min Size
min_size.description: all ROIs below this size, in pixels, will be discarded. Defaults to 15.

max_size_fraction.title: Max Size Fraction
max_size_fraction.description: max_size_fraction (float, optional): Masks larger than max_size_fraction of total image size are removed. Default is 0.4.

niter.title: Niter
niter.description: number of iterations for dynamics computation if None, it is set proportional to the diameter. Defaults to None.

augment.title: Augment
augment.description: tiles image with overlapping tiles and flips overlapped regions to augment. Defaults to False.

tile_overlap.title: Tile Overlap
tile_overlap.description: fraction of overlap of tiles when computing flows. Defaults to 0.1.

bsize.title: Bsize
bsize.description: block size for tiles, recommended to keep at 224, like in training. Defaults to 256.

verbose.title: Verbose
verbose.description: whether cellpose logs should be active. Defaults to False.

mode.title: Mode
mode.description: Specifies how to interpret the identifier. Can be "label", "wavelength_id", or "index" (must be an integer). At least one and at most three identifiers must be provided.

identifiers.title: Identifiers
identifiers.description: Unique identifier for the channel. This can be a channel label, wavelength ID, or index.

mode.title: Mode
mode.description: Literal["Create Masking ROI Table"]: Mode to create masking ROI table.

table_name.title: Table Name
table_name.description: str: Name of the masking ROI table to be created. Defaults to "{label_name}_masking_ROI_table", where {label_name} is the name of the label image used for segmentation.

mode.title: Mode
mode.description: Literal["custom"]: Use custom normalization with full control over parameters.

normalize.title: Normalize
normalize.description: Whether to perform normalization. Defaults to True.

norm3D.title: Norm3D
norm3D.description: Whether to normalize in 3D. If True, the entire 3D stack will be normalized per channel. If False, normalization is applied per Z-slice. Defaults to False.

invert.title: Invert
invert.description: Whether to invert the image. Useful if cells are dark instead of bright. Defaults to False.

use_lowhigh.title: Use Lowhigh
use_lowhigh.description: Whether to use lowhigh normalization. If False, percentile normalization will be used instead. Defaults to False.

lowhigh.title: Lowhigh
lowhigh.description: The lower and upper bounds for normalization. Can be a tuple of two values (applied to all channels) or an array of shape (nchan, 2) for per-channel normalization. Incompatible with smoothing and sharpening. Defaults to None.

percentile.title: Percentile
percentile.description: The lower and upper percentiles for normalization. If provided, it should be a tuple of two values. Each value should be between 0 and 100. If use_lowhigh is True, this parameter is ignored. Defaults to (1.0, 99.0).

sharpen_radius.title: Sharpen Radius
sharpen_radius.description: The radius for sharpening the image. Defaults to 0.

smooth_radius.title: Smooth Radius
smooth_radius.description: The radius for smoothing the image. Defaults to 0.

tile_norm_blocksize.title: Tile Norm Blocksize
tile_norm_blocksize.description: The block size for tile-based normalization. Defaults to 0.

tile_norm_smooth3D.title: Tile Norm Smooth3D
tile_norm_smooth3D.description: The smoothness factor for tile-based normalization in 3D. Defaults to 1.

axis.title: Axis
axis.description: The channel axis to loop over for normalization. Defaults to -1.

mode.title: Mode
mode.description: Literal["default"]: Use Cellpose default normalization (0-1 rescaling and 1%-99% percentile clipping). all other parameters are ignored.

sigma_xy.title: Sigma Xy
sigma_xy.description: Standard deviation for Gaussian kernel in XY plane.

sigma_z.title: Sigma Z
sigma_z.description: Standard deviation for Gaussian kernel in Z axis. If not specified, no smoothing is applied in Z axis.

masking.title: Masking Iterator Configuration
masking.description: If set, the segmentation will be performed only within the confines of the specified mask. A mask can be specified either by a label image or a Masking ROI table.

roi_table.title: Iterate Over ROIs
roi_table.description: Name of a ROI table. If set, the segmentation will be applied to each ROI in the table individually. This option can be combined with masking.

mode.title: Mode
mode.description: Mode of masking to be applied. If "Table Name", the identifier refers to a masking table name. If "Label Name", the identifier refers to a label image name.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Name of the masking table or label image depending on the mode.

size_xy.title: Size Xy
size_xy.description: Size in pixels of the median filter in XY plane.

size_z.title: Size Z
size_z.description: Size in pixels of the median filter in Z axis. If not specified, no filtering is applied in Z axis.

mode.title: Mode
mode.description: Literal["none"]: Do not apply any normalization, and ignore all other parameters.

PrePostProcessConfiguration.description: Configuration for pre- and post-processing steps.
PrePostProcessConfiguration.title: PrePostProcessConfiguration

min_size.title: Min Size
min_size.description: Minimum size in pixels for objects to keep.

SkipCreateMaskingRoiTable.description: Skip Creating Masking ROI Table Configuration

mode.title: Mode
mode.description: Literal["Skip Creating Masking ROI Table"]: Mode to skip creating masking ROI table

SkipCreateMaskingRoiTable.title: SkipCreateMaskingRoiTable

channels.title: Channels
channels.description: Channels to use for segmentation. It must contain between 1 and 3 channel identifiers.

label_name.title: Label Name
label_name.description: Name of the resulting label image. If not provided, it will be set to "<channel_identifier>_segmented".

level_path.title: Level Path
level_path.description: If the OME-Zarr has multiple resolution levels, the level to use can be specified here. If not provided, the highest resolution level will be used.

iterator_configuration.title: Iterator Configuration
iterator_configuration.description: Configuration for the segmentation iterator. This can be used to specify masking and/or a ROI table.

custom_model.title: Custom Model
custom_model.description: Path to a custom Cellpose model. If not set, the default "cpsam" model will be used.

pre_post_process.title: Pre Post Process
pre_post_process.description: Configuration for pre- and post-processing steps.

create_masking_roi_table.title: Create Masking Roi Table
create_masking_roi_table.description: Configuration to create a masking ROI table after segmentation.

overwrite.title: Overwrite
overwrite.description: Whether to overwrite an existing label image. Defaults to True.
